title: Save Mayrina
content: ells you, that the hag can not Die, after you tell him she is dead. The Drow-Half-Elf (Mask of Revenge) will attack you, as soon as you chose any dialogue option. The other three will join the fight, so best not to talk to her. You can take the Head from Magron (Drow) to "Kill" her. There is some loot after taking the Head. You can destroy the Mirror (Calim). Doing so will afflict the attacking character with Bane as if from the spell until you complete a Long Rest. You can use a Basilisk Potion
